The message of warning must be carried to every nation upon the globe. The work should move forward with alacrity. Satan is already astir to hedge up the way. We must be wise or he will prevail. What we do must be executed with greater promptness.--Letter 34, 1875, p. 7. (To S. N. Haskell, October 12, 1875.) 

Released February 1, 1978.
